name: DEATHSMASHERS 4
description:
Frantic, physics based FPS with deep learning AI-based enemy animation and simulation.

You are hungry. Right click to eat.

made for 7dfps 2020

Programming/design: Ruan Rothmann @rrza

Art: Jarred Lunt @thejunt

Sound/Music: Joonas Turner @kissakolme

EXTRA special thanks to Unity's MLAgents team without whom this project would not have been possible.
